comment: A reflexive, symmetric, transitive relation is an equivalence relation on its domain. Inference version of ~ iserd , which avoids the need to provide a "dummy antecedent" ` ph ` if there is no natural one to choose. (Contributed by AV, 30-Apr-2021.)
